notes.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
notes.p: This study was approved by the Columbia University IRB Committee under protocol number IRB-AAAR1524 and the Guinea IRB Committee under number 004/CNERS/17 as a non-human subjects study. As this was a non-human subjects study, no participants were enrolled. In order to use preserved samples, we received a waiver of consent and all data associated with study samples was de-identified.
